1.title: And We're Back
1.plot: The students are back for another exciting year at Keaton. Vanessa and Carly must face some hard consequences, Jax's summer comes back to haunt him and Alya and Miles compete to be mentored by one of Keaton's top music students.

2.title: Leading by Example
2.plot: A new addition to the Primas finds Carly struggling to keep the new recruits in line. Kit helps her sister, Scarlett, try to sing again. Alya discovers Frances' teaching methods aren't what she expected.

3.title: Choices
3.plot: The prestigious CAMDAs are announced. Julie is forced to make a tough decision while Jenna's TMK posts land her in hot water. Meanwhile, Kit gets tired of Jax taking all of DJ Diamondmind's credit.

4.title: The One
4.plot: The competition in dance class heats up as Sasha and Beckett fight for a chance to duet with Carly for the CAMDAs. Miles comes to terms with his feelings for Alya. Scarlett searches for a new vice president.

5.title: Take the Note
5.plot: Vanessa's attempts to salvage Carly and Beckett's CAMDA duet put her in a difficult spot. Bianca lashes out after some devastating news. Julie struggles to find out who she really is as an artist.

6.title: Gotta Be Strong
6.plot: Vanessa gets in the middle of a feuding Beckett and Ms. Helsweel. Miles finds himself reliving some tough memories. Jenna's plan to cheer up Sasha backfires.

7.title: In Her Shadow
7.plot: The dancers' performances are put at risk when Beckett threatens to leave Keaton. George struggles with his first task as vice president. Bianca helps Kit with her latest track.

8.title: Control
8.plot: Carly enlists Vanessa's help to take the Primas choreography to the next level. Alya puts Frances' group in a tough position while Jax tries to convince Kit to save DJ Diamondmind.

9.title: Qualifiers: Day 1
9.plot: As students from around the country head to Keaton for the CAMDAs, an unexpected visitor causes Alya to come face to face with her stage fright. Vanessa discovers the awful truth behind the sprinkler video and Jax plans to win back Bianca.

10.title: Qualifiers: Day 2
10.plot: As the qualifiers continue, Sasha and Jenna's duet takes an unexpected turn. Julie finds out her dance results while Cassandra learns what happens when you mix the personal and the professional.

11.title: Wrong Side of a Love Song
11.plot: Sasha copes with the fallout of his CAMDA performance. Scarlett and Bianca work on a love song. George finds an unlikely partner in Mindy.

12.title: Shake It Off
12.plot: A new class assignment has Bianca on edge. Vanessa receives a surprise from Beckett. An old friend returns to Keaton.

13.title: Clear Eyes
13.plot: As preparation for the CAMDA finals heat up, Sloane's Crew and the Primas forge an unlikely alliance. Julie questions her relationship with Miles. Bianca helps Kit get over her writer's block.

14.title: Mixing It Up
14.plot: Scarlett attempts to save the CAMDA mixer with a little help from Vice President, George. Vanessa struggles with what to do with Ms. Maria's choreography. Jax says goodbye to a close friend.

15.title: In the Dark
15.plot: With months of hard work and dedication on the line, the CAMDA finals have arrived, pushing the students to the limit as an unforeseen event jeopardizes all of their performances.

16.title: Prima Donna
16.plot: Carly and Cassandra fight for control over the Primas. Bianca enlists Scarlett's help for a new song. Alya and Julie form an unlikely team to help Miles.

17.title: Best Idea
17.plot: A new interdisciplinary assignment leads to some unexpected pairings. Miles' leadership is tested by Matteo. Vanessa attempts to keep it professional with Beckett. George helps his group in his own unique way.

18.title: Caught
18.plot: Carly takes drastic measures to pay for her hip hop audition. Sasha and Jax collaborate to prove Scarlett wrong. Bianca's search for the spotlight leaves others in the dark.

19.title: Telling Stories
19.plot: Alya's lyrics hit too close to home for Vanessa and Beckett. Sasha learns a valuable lesson about forgiveness. Julie discovers the mystery behind the missing money.

20.title: Two Steps Forward
20.plot: With the interdisciplinary performances coming to a close, Miles' jealousy ends in sabotage. Beckett and Helsweel clash. Scarlett discovers that performing for her boyfriend is harder than it seems.

21.title: Obvious
21.plot: Carly finds help in an unlikely tutor when a famous choreographer comes to Keaton. Jax realizes he has feelings for an unexpected person. Julie gets help from Matteo.

22.title: Comfort Zone
22.plot: Scarlett and Bianca decide to make a music video, unfortunately they both butt heads on what kind of video. Carly's overexertion catches up to her. Miles struggles to find a new sound.

23.title: Lesson. Learned
23.plot: With Alya's lyrics causing unrest, Bianca schemes to teach her a lesson. George and Azadeh butt heads over artistic preferences. Jenna learns to take the lead.

24.title: In Your Eyes
24.plot: Beckett and Carly search for a new audience. Julie hijacks Matteo's art seminar. Jax puts it all on the line for Kit.

25.title: Clean Slate
25.plot: The grade ten class struggles to cope with the fate of Helsweel. Bianca uses unorthodox methods to bring a top record label to Keaton. Alya tries to win back her friends the only way she knows how.

26.title: Not for Sale
26.plot: Vanessa and Carly devise a plan to save Keaton. An influential buyer puts the fate of Julie and Matteo's art project at risk. Scarlett's relationship with Aidan is put to the test.

27.title: Legacy
27.plot: Jenna finds herself at a loss when the Grade 12's steal her Seasons role. Jax helps Miles overcome his biggest adversary, math. Alya and Bianca try to rekindle their friendship.

28.title: Hope
28.plot: Scarlett rallies the troops to save Keaton even if it means enlisting the help of her best friend's enemy. The Primas return, but not everyone gets an invitation. Alya uncovers the truth behind Miles' odd behaviour.

29.title: Almost There
29.plot: As the fight to save Keaton continues, Carly struggles to tell Vanessa the truth about her summer plans. Kit and Bianca debate on how to deal with a Scarlett super fan. Sasha helps Jenna find her own dance group.

30.title: Apart But Together
30.plot: With the fate of the school in the balance, the students perform the show of a lifetime. But will it be enough to save Keaton?

1.title: The First Day
1.plot: Best friend ballet dancers Vanessa and Carly embark on their first day at the prestigious Keaton School of the Arts and find themselves in direct competition. Singer Alya struggles with stage fright.

2.title: Groups of Two
2.plot: Carly and Vanessa are forced to dance with new partners. Jax disapproves of Miles's preferential treatment in music class. Alya contends with a celebrity classmate.

3.title: The Brightside
3.plot: Student council president Julie plans a spectacular freshman orientation. Tension mounts between Carly and Vanessa. Miles keeps a secret from his classmates.

4.title: Stand Tall
4.plot: Vanessa enlists Carly's help to impress the Prima dancers. Bianca seeks the help of a reluctant classmate. The pressure is on for Denzel to wow his artistic hero.

5.title: Take Me Out
5.plot: Carly worries emotions are interfering in her duet with Sasha. Kit and Denzel are paired with a singer with an attitude. Jax's friendship with Miles forces him out of his comfort zone.

6.title: Dig Deeper
6.plot: Alya's new musical partnership doesn't go as hoped. Singer Scarlett struggles with a movement for non-movers class. Vanessa is hurt when Carly forgets their friendiversary.

7.title: In Their Shoes
7.plot: Auditions for the mid-term ballet pit Vanessa and Carly against each other yet again. Miles's new lease on life has Jax concerned for his friend's health. Scarlett's intrigue with Julie grows.

8.title: On Deck
8.plot: Bianca is determined to impress her casting agent mother who is holding auditions at Keaton. Jax challenges Kit to a DJ battle. Denzel's costume designs for the mid-term ballet are put to the test.

9.title: Sotto Voce
9.plot: Kit faces expulsion from Keaton if she doesn't reveal her secret. Vanessa needs Carly's help to impress Ms. Helstweel. Friction builds when Miles is forced to share studio space with Julie.

10.title: The Understudy
10.plot: Alya's newfound celebrity status at Keaton intensifies her rivalry with Bianca. Sasha comes up with a plan to win Carly's friendship back. Scarlett loses her voice.

11.title: Lose Yourself
11.plot: Julie stands up for her right to artistic expression. Vanessa pushes herself to her limits to impress Ms. Maria. Bianca reconsiders her future at Keaton.

12.title: Plays Well with Others
12.plot: Vanessa's personal life threatens her status in the Primas. Scarlett struggles to find her voice in an acapella group. Miles seeks the affection of a crush.

13.title: Hold On
13.plot: Carly is desperate to cheer up Vanessa after getting her kicked out of the primas. Bianca struggles to come clean with her secret. Denzel must make his mark in the art world before he turns 14.

14.title: Twelve Hours to Showtime
14.plot: Tensions run high throughout Keaton as the mid-term performances approach. Vanessa is determined to dance in the freshman ballet despite her injury. Miles is disappointed with Alya's commitment to their partnership.

15.title: Showtime
15.plot: As the curtains open on Keaton's mid-term performances, the fate of every student hangs in the balance.

16.title: Restart
16.plot: School is back in session but nothing is what it was before the break. New musical partnerships, changing dynamics in the dance stream and missing faces in the halls have all of Keaton's students coping to adjust.

17.title: Juggle
17.plot: Sasha finds himself caught in the middle of Vanessa and Carly's feud. Miles must come to grips with the new normal at Keaton. Scarlett's presidency is threatened.

18.title: Stings and Sticks
18.plot: Bianca's feelings for Jax resurface when she agrees to do a favour for Jenna. The arrival of a mysterious film student has Carly distracted from dance. Denzel must win over the student body to accomplish an ambitious project.

19.title: Once in a Lifetime
19.plot: Vanessa's frustration with not being able to dance reaches a boiling point. Miles is shocked when a familiar face returns. Julie broadens her creative horizons with extraordinary results.

20.title: Da Capo
20.plot: Alya's attempt to reintegrate into life at Keaton is met with hostility from her peers. Carly questions her feelings for Austin. Kit attempts to inject her true identity into her music.

21.title: Friend or Foe
21.plot: The music students put aside their differences to get through a difficult day. Vanessa makes a promise she might not be able to keep. Denzel must deliver bad news to a friend.

22.title: Verite
22.plot: Julie is consumed with guilt over cheating on her PSATs. A musical roots assignment hits an emotional nerve with Scarlett. Carly's insecurities about her dancing get the better of her.

23.title: Step Up
23.plot: Julie faces the consequences of cheating but they are not at all what she expected. Miles is nervous to define his relationship with Alya. Vanessa questions whether or not she will be able to dance again.

24.title: Ensemble
24.plot: The freshmen dance class is dead set on getting revenge on Julie for Ms. Maria's firing. Scarlett makes a discovery that unsettles Kit. Vanessa runs interference in Carly's relationship.

25.title: After the Flood
25.plot: Sasha exposes a classmate's secret on his blog, with heartbreaking results. Bianca's guilt over her role in Jax's breakup finally gets the best of her. Jenna's new friendship puts her at odds with the rest of the grade nine dancers.

26.title: Try Again
26.plot: Creative differences threaten to put an end to Denzel's music video. Sasha enlists Vanessa's help to audition for Sloane's dance crew. Carly's role in the sprinkler incident comes into question.

27.title: Fallout
27.plot: In the aftermath of Austin's bullying, Kit worries for Denzel's well being. Alya's attempt to seek comfort in Miles leads to disappointment. Vanessa tries to rebuild her friendship with a distant Carly.

28.title: Lead the Way
28.plot: The dance students rally together amid threats that their secret will be exposed. Bianca is determined to make memories with Jax. Denzel faces a new challenge.

29.title: Me
29.plot: Carly and Vanessa find themselves on opposing sides of a Keaton dance rivalry. Bianca gets a career opportunity that could jeopardize her future with Jax. Alya questions Miles's feelings for a former crush.

30.title: We
30.plot: Keaton's talent is on display at the Open House. Scarlett fears the worst about her voice. Miles struggles with whether or not to tell Alya about Julie. Carly and Vanessa's friendship is threatened by the arrival of a Juilliard scout.

imdb.title: Backstage
plot: Talented high school students at a fine arts school hone their crafts while dealing with the drama that comes from tough teachers, competitive friends, and their own self worth.
